top_stories.title: India orders social media platforms to take down deepfakes faster
top_stories.description: India’s new rules take effect February 20, tightening deepfake oversight and shrinking takedown windows to as little as two hours.
top_stories.author: Jagmeet Singh
top_stories.content: India’s new rules take effect February 20, tightening deepfake oversight and shrinking takedown windows to as little as two hours.

top_stories.title: How Associa transforms document classification with the GenAI IDP Accelerator and Amazon Bedrock
top_stories.description: Associa collaborated with the AWS Generative AI Innovation Center to build a generative AI-powered document classification system aligning with Associa’s long-term vision of using generative AI to achieve operational efficiencies in document management. The solution automatically categorizes incoming documents with high accuracy, processes documents efficiently, and provides substantial cost savings while maintaining operational excellence. The document classification system, developed using...
top_stories.author: David Meredith, Josh Zacharias
top_stories.content: Associa collaborated with the AWS Generative AI Innovation Center to build a generative AI-powered document classification system aligning with Associa’s long-term vision of using generative AI to achieve operational efficiencies in document management. The solution automatically categorizes incoming documents with high accuracy, processes documents efficiently, and provides substantial cost savings while maintaining operational excellence. top_stories.title: IBM Introduces Autonomous Storage With Agentic AI FlashSystem
top_stories.description: IBM (NYSE: IBM) today unveiled the next generation of IBM FlashSystem, co-run by agentic AI, ushering in a new era of autonomous storage. By enhancing FlashSystem’s existing AI capabilities with agentic AI, IBM is redefining resilience through sustained protection, autonomous threat analysis, and customized recovery recommendations. Clients can now turn storage into... The post IBM Introduces Autonomous Storage With Agentic AI FlashSystem first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Google AI Introduces Natively Adaptive Interfaces (NAI): An Agentic Multimodal Accessibility Framework Built on Gemini for Adaptive UI Design
top_stories.description: Google Research is proposing a new way to build accessible software with Natively Adaptive Interfaces (NAI), an agentic framework where a multimodal AI agent becomes the primary user interface and adapts the application in real time to each user’s abilities and context. Instead of shipping a fixed UI and adding accessibility as a separate layer, […] The post Google AI Introduces Natively Adaptive Interfaces (NAI): An Agentic Multimodal Accessibility Framework Built on Gemini for Adaptive UI...
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
